content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. Nice to meet you. I am always happy to show my apartment to potential tenants. Now, about the rental price. I am looking for a decent amount, say, 2000 Euros per month. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I am sure you will find it quite convenient and comfortable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite expensive for me. I am a student and I am looking for something more affordable. Would it be possible to lower the rent to 1000 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but 1000 Euros per month is way too low for this apartment. It's in the city center, close to all important facilities, and it's a newly built apartment. I can consider 1500 Euros per month as a favor to you, considering your student status. But I assure you, this is the lowest I can go.
